chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
P: ProgrammingLanguage
iP: ImperativeProgrammingLanguage P
MD: Model
R: Relation model
po_R: PreOrder Krelation
BSS: BigStepSemantics P model
iBSS: ImpBigStepSemantics P model BSS
L: Language
minL: MinimumLanguage L
pL: PropositionalLanguage L
sepconL: SepconLanguage L
wandL: WandLanguage L
SM: Semantics L MD
kiSM: KripkeIntuitionisticSemantics L MD tt SM
kminSM: KripkeMinimumSemantics L MD tt SM
kpSM: KripkePropositionalSemantics L MD tt SM

Goal:
forall (c1 c2 : cmd) (P1 P2 P3 : expr), triple_partial_valid P1 c1 P2 -> triple_partial_valid P2 c2 P3 -> triple_partial_valid P1 (Ssequence c1 c2) P3

Total.access_Swhile : forall (b : bool_expr) (c : cmd) (s : ?state) (ms : MetaState ?state), access s (Swhile b c) ms -> Total.loop_access_fin (fun (s0 : ?state) (ms0 : MetaState ?state) => access s0 c ms0) (fun s0 : ?state => Total.eval_bool s0 b) s ms \/ Total.loop_access_inf (fun (s0 : ?state) (ms0 : MetaState ?state) => access s0 c ms0) (fun s0 : ?state => Total.eval_bool s0 b) s /\ ms = NonTerminating where ?P : [P : ProgrammingLanguage iP : ImperativeProgrammingLanguage P MD : Model R : Relation model po_R : PreOrder Krelation BSS : BigStepSemantics P model iBSS : ImpBigStepSemantics P model BSS L : Language minL : MinimumLanguage L pL : PropositionalLanguage L sepconL : Sep...

access_defined : forall (s : ?state) (c : cmd), exists ms : MetaState ?state, access s c ms where ?P : [P : ProgrammingLanguage iP : ImperativeProgrammingLanguage P MD : Model R : Relation model po_R : PreOrder Krelation BSS : BigStepSemantics P model iBSS : ImpBigStepSemantics P model BSS L : Language minL : MinimumLanguage L pL : PropositionalLanguage L sepconL : SepconLanguage L wandL : WandLanguage L SM : Semantics L MD kiSM : KripkeIntuitionisticSemantics L MD tt SM kminSM : KripkeMinimumSemantics L MD tt SM kpSM : KripkePropositionalSemantics L MD tt SM |- ProgrammingLanguage] ?state : [P : ProgrammingLanguage iP : ImperativeProgrammingLanguage P MD : Model R : Relation model po_R : PreOrder Krelation BSS : BigStepSemantics P model iBSS : ImpBigStepSemantics P model BSS L...
Swhile_Sskip : forall (b : bool_expr) (c : cmd), Swhile b c <> Sskip where ?P : [P : ProgrammingLanguage iP : ImperativeProgrammingLanguage P MD : Model R : Relation model po_R : PreOrder Krelation BSS : BigStepSemantics P model iBSS : ImpBigStepSemantics P model BSS L : Language minL : MinimumLanguage L pL : PropositionalLanguage L sepconL : SepconLanguage L wandL : WandLanguage L SM : Semantics L MD kiSM : KripkeIntuitionisticSemantics L MD tt SM kminSM : KripkeMinimumSemantics L MD tt SM kpSM : KripkePropositionalSemantics L MD tt SM |- ProgrammingLanguage] ?iP : [P : ProgrammingLanguage iP : ImperativeProgrammingLanguage P MD : Model R : Relation model po_R : PreOrder Krelation BSS : BigStepSemantics P model iBSS : ImpBigStepSemantics P model BSS L : Language...
access_Ssequence : forall (c1 c2 : cmd) (s : model) (ms : MetaState model), access s (Ssequence c1 c2) ms -> exists ms' ms'' : MetaState model, access s c1 ms' /\ forward ms' ms'' /\ lift_access ms'' c2 ms
Build_NormalImperativeProgrammingLanguage : forall (P : ProgrammingLanguage) (iP : ImperativeProgrammingLanguage P), (forall c1 c2 c1' c2' : cmd, Ssequence c1 c2 = Ssequence c1' c2' -> c1 = c1' /\ c2 = c2') -> (forall c1 c2 : cmd, Ssequence c1 c2 <> Sskip) -> (forall (b : bool_expr) (c1 c2 : cmd) (b' : bool_expr) (c1' c2' : cmd), Sifthenelse b c1 c2 = Sifthenelse b' c1' c2' -> b = b' /\ c1 = c1' /\ c2 = c2') -> (forall (b : bool_expr) (c1 c2 : cmd), Sifthenelse b c1 c2 <> Sskip) ->...-> NormalImperativeProgrammingLanguage P
Build_ImpBigStepSemantics : forall (P : ProgrammingLanguage) (iP : ImperativeProgrammingLanguage P) (state : Type) (state_R : Relation state) (BSS : BigStepSemantics P state) (eval_bool : state -> bool_expr -> Prop), (forall b : bool_expr, Krelation_stable_Kdenote (fun s : state => eval_bool s b)) -> (forall (c1 c2 : cmd) (s : state) (ms : MetaState state), access s (Ssequence c1 c2) ms -> exists ms' ms'' : MetaState state, access s c1 ms' /\ forward ms' ms'' /\ lift_access ms'' c2 ms) ->...-> ImpBigStepSemantics P state BSS
Total.Build_ImpBigStepSemantics : forall (P : ProgrammingLanguage) (iP : ImperativeProgrammingLanguage P) (state : Type) (state_R : Relation state) (BSS : BigStepSemantics P state) (eval_bool : state -> bool_expr -> Prop), (forall b : bool_expr, Krelation_stable_Kdenote (fun s : state => eval_bool s b)) -> (forall (c1 c2 : cmd) (s : state) (ms : MetaState state), access s (Ssequence c1 c2) ms -> exists ms' ms'' : MetaState state, access s c1 ms' /\ Total.forward ms' ms'' /\ lift_access ms'' c2 ms) ->...-> Total.ImpBigStepSemantics P state BSS

```coq
intros c1 c2 P1 P2 P3 H1 H2 s_pre ms_post Hpre Haccess.
unfold triple_partial_valid in *. 
intros spre' ms_post' Hpre' Haccess'.
apply H2 with (s_pre := s_pre) in H1 as H.
apply H with (spre' := spre') in H as Htriple.
apply Htriple; assumption.
Qed.```

original: intros c1 c2 P1 P2 P3 H1 H2 s_pre ms_post Hpre Haccess. unfold triple_partial_valid in *. intros spre' ms_post' Hpre' Haccess'. apply H2 with (s_pre := s_pre) in H1 as H. apply H with (spre' := spre') in H as Htriple. apply Htriple; auto.
